properties.entry: INSERT INTO TB_REPORT ( RPT_NO , MEM_NO , RPT_MEM_NO , RPT_REASON_NO , RPT_REF_CAT , RPT_REF_NO , RPT_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_RPTNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , 2 , ? , SYSDATE )

SELECT DISTINCT MEM_ID AS "RPT_MEM_ID", R.RPT_REF_NO, CASE WHEN RPT_REF_CAT = 1 THEN '후기' WHEN RPT_REF_CAT = 2 THEN '댓글' END "CATEGORY", COUNT FROM TB_REPORT R JOIN TB_MEMBER M ON (M.MEM_NO = R.RPT_MEM_NO) JOIN VW_REPORTCOUNT RC ON(R.RPT_REF_NO = RC.RPT_REF_NO)
